item.description:
Come join in the fun and play some ultimate frisbee! All skill levels are welcome! Don't worry if you have never played, we can teach you.  Competition is friendly and fun! Bring your friends! 

 

Make sure you wear clothes and shoes good for running because this is definitely a work out! Don't forget to bring a drink!  If you have cleats, it really helps!  Just make sure they are plastic not metal cleats.  With the weather getting colder, it would help to bring a thin pair of gloves that you can wear and still throw/catch with until your fingers warm up.

 

Back to Hope High School again! Look for us on the football field. They put up ropes at Wheeler school (maybe for us?)   

 

My number is 703-314-3380 in case you can't find us.
item.name: Frisbee Fun!
